name: The Lore of Farhan and the Magical Kebab
name_original: The Lore of Farhan and the Magical Kebab
description:
The Lore of Farhan and the Magical Kebab is a RPG game developed by ff_crafter. It came out on 12-11-2022.
You can play The Lore of Farhan and the Magical Kebab on Web. The game is sold via itch.io.
